Server.Name: 7 Day Horde Edition
Server.Description: The Ravenhearst Mod v2.2 7 Day Horde Edition. It comes with a 72 slot Backpack and vanilla settings like weather enabled, 7 Day Blood Moons and profanity and nude zombies. 2.2 Version that includes all files needed for both Single Player and Multiplayer/Dedicated Versions

Server.Name: 21 Day Horde Edition
Server.Description: The Ravenhearst Mod v2.2 21 Day Horde Edition. 2.2 Version that includes all files needed for both Single Player and Multiplayer/Dedicated Versions

Server.Name: 7 Day Horde Streamer Edition
Server.Description: Streamer Friendly Version of The Ravenhearst Mod v2.2 7 Day Horde Edition with removed nude zombies and removed profanity as well as no copyright Night Terror sounds. 2.2 Version that includes all files needed for both Single Player and Multiplayer/Dedicated Versions

Server.Name: 21 Day Horde Streamer Edition
Server.Description: Streamer Friendly Version of The Ravenhearst Mod v2.2 7 Day Horde Edition with removed nude zombies and removed profanity as well as no copyright Night Terror sounds. 2.2 Version that includes all files needed for both Single Player and Multiplayer/Dedicated Versions
